game.name: Minebot expedition
game.shortDescription: 마인봇 원정대는 위험한 땅을 탐험하고 귀중한 에메랄드를 수집하고 킬러 꿀벌의 공격을 피하는 로봇으로 플레이하는 플랫 포머입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Minebot expedition - Minebot is going on a new expedition! He won't miss any of the precious minerals wielded by the dangerous robo bees on their way in this offbeat platformer!

reviewHighlights.text: This game offers an exciting and immersive mining adventure with great mechanics and engaging gameplay. It’s fun, challenging, and perfect for fans of...
Minebot: Expedition surprised me – simple yet captivating! Dodging those killer bees while collecting shiny emeralds felt like old-school platforming...
